remarks: Value of a translation composition in terms of an associated atom. (Contributed by NM, 28-Apr-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cdlemg7fv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemg7fv.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg7fv.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemg7fv.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemg7fv.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg7fv.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg7fv.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg7fvN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( X e. B /\ -. X .<_ W ) ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T /\ ( P .\/ ( X ./\ W ) ) = X ) ) -> ( F ` ( G ` X ) ) = ( ( F ` ( G ` P ) ) .\/ ( X ./\ W ) ) ) $.
